name: RiftWorld
description:
RiftWorld is a full-length RPG game about dimensions,  gates that opened up one day and began to expel the aggressive denizens of other worlds. With the world at risk of being overrun and destroyed, brave warriors journey through these rifts to close these gates and keep our world safe. However, as more and more tear their way closer to our realm, not everything can be saved. But, with all the power you can muster, will you be able to save your home?

=========================================

All right, with story out of the way, RiftWorld is an rpg-adventure game with multiple endings. It is made by Dragon Studios (me), and has many different aspects due to these rifts being unpredictable. You might find yourself in an entirely new game with some of them!

The current Demo (V.4.0) consists of a small world to explore and other things such as an arcade minigame to keep you busy and enjoying things while the main story is developed.
